excerpt: for the first one well I'm going to go with I got to go really 100% with the dividend stock that I've been buying the most of recently myself and that is a Reit known as vich properties ticker symbol VI I which I can explain my case for very Simply Now reason number one the business is fantastic for being a re it's probably as good of a real estate business that you could really hope for because they own close to 100 properties in North America with their biggest tenant being gaming and entertainment clients including most of the top casino resorts in Vegas like Caesars MGM and more Now these are massive gambling and casino businesses that are just about as sticky as you can get to they're pretty resilient to recessions they generally sign multi-decade contracts with the REITs and because of their massive size along with strict gambling regul what's extremely hard for any of them to really relocate and thus it gives vichi not only a wide Moes but also some of the highest occupancy and rent collection rates in the world in fact during the 2020 pandemic when much of the Vegas Strip was even closed down W vichi was one of the few rats out there to still bring in 100% of the rent during the entire time the entire pandemic Now reason number two interest rates are coming down that's going to make it really where these big dividend paying rats like vichi become more valuable to investors because sinking rates will make it cheaper for the company to acquire more real estate and expand thus helping them grow while also making their High dividend yields more attractive to income seeking investors because of other assets offering really lower rates and yields by comparison and yet reason number three a recent dip has actually left the stock down about 177% from the top leaving behind a mouthwatering dividend yield of close to 6% now I'm absolutely loving the stock at these levels and I continue to be a buyer myself for the long term
